rows.label: tlk43320242_03_msg0001
rows.name:
That request I took earlier...
I just couldn't do it.

rows.label: tlk43320242_03_msg0002
rows.name:
There's some monsters that give
extra strength to their buddies if
they stay close to them in battle.

rows.label: tlk43320242_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If you run into a monster like that,
you need to take out the one that's
supporting the others first off.
